Apple hits seven-week low after Barclays downgradeApple on Tuesday fell nearly 3% to a seven-week low after Barclays downgraded the shares of the world's most valuable firm on concerns demand for its devices from the iPhone to Mac will remain weak in 2024. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 14:48:01 GMT 3OKMEDIPDJNXLPAWBYOEBD3ADE https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-starts-2024-with-barclays-downgrade-2024-01-02/Aditya Soni, Medha Singh技术
China breaks heat records in 2023 as sweltering weather baked cities from north to southThe heat in China was relenting in 2023 with temperature records broken from Beijing to Shanghai, echoing the global heatwave phenomena that also engulfed most of the world and raised more concerns about global climate change. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 14:43:25 GMT DGB2ZCUBLJJEPKJ7FF2R26Z3XM https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/china-breaks-heat-records-2023-sweltering-weather-baked-cities-north-south-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中国
Russian LNG exports to Europe fell 1.9% in 2023 - LSEG dataRussian exports of liquefied natural gas (LNG) to Europe fell 1.9% to 15.8 million metric tons in 2023, and LNG exports to Asia fell 11% to 14.9 million tons, LSEG data showed on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 14:08:53 GMT EZHCOZJ5J5JAROKWHESSBIOXOY https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/Russian-lng-exports-europe-fell-19-2023-lseg-data-2024-01-02/Reuters商业活力
Tesla deliveries beat estimates as year-end sales push pays offTesla delivered a record number of electric vehicles in the fourth quarter, beating market estimates and meeting its 2023 target of 1.8 million vehicles as a year-end sales push paid off. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 13:44:58 GMT ROUKIBYX7ZORZAYF5YBBDNP5IQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/teslas-fourth-quarter-deliveries-beat-estimates-2024-01-02/Akash Sriram商业汽车与交通
Exclusive: China removes official after video games rules spark turmoilChina removed an official at a government body overseeing its press and publications regulator, five sources who were briefed on the matter said, days after Chinese gaming stocks were hit by proposed rules to curb spending on video games. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 13:27:31 GMT GH2FTJH625JIPFNKNXPVHJY4XY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-removes-official-after-video-games-rules-spark-turmoil-sources-2024-01-02/Josh Ye世界中国
Morning Bid: S&P 500 record in view as 2024 begins in same veinA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Samuel Indyk. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 11:04:31 GMT 6FMXX7SQORNABECVGP4VCZQ3R4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-01-02/Reuters市场美国市场
